key_context.summary: Team member learned to use @group instead of @here for PR reviews. PR #60006 was approved after clarifying it only affects maintenance scripts, not frontend k8s calls.
key_context.relevance: Establishes team communication norms and PR approval workflow

key_context.summary: Inspector bot regularly reports no issues found for the pet food team across multiple team name variations (new ventures/pet food, new-ventures/pet-food, new-ventures-and-ecosystems/pets-table).
key_context.relevance: Shows automated monitoring is active and team infrastructure is healthy

key_context.summary: Pre-checkout-selection-service is being migrated to FTCP cluster, starting with 100% staging traffic and beginning gradual rollout to production (30% mentioned).
key_context.relevance: Major infrastructure change that could impact checkout functionality

key_context.summary: TPT checkout reported as not working, and KRS disabled on staging due to recurring selection issues.
key_context.relevance: Critical issues affecting checkout and selection functionality

summary: Team handled PR approval for maintenance script updates, dealt with checkout and recurring selection issues, and began migrating pre-checkout-selection-service to FTCP cluster while receiving regular automated infrastructure health reports.
